service

Class GameService

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.GameService

  • public class GameService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handle all the service call from GameController class and provide business logic for same.
    Author:
    Yogesh

      • assignTerritories

        public void assignTerritories(java.util.List<Player> numberOfPlayers)
        This method is used to allocate territories to different players randomly.
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers: - It has all the player object.

      • calcArmiesForReinforcement

        public void calcArmiesForReinforcement(Player playerInFocus)
        This method calculate the number of armies which needs to be given to a player for reinforcement phase.
        Parameters:
        playerInFocus: - Player who is currently in reinforcement phase

      • ifContinentOccupied

        public boolean ifContinentOccupied(java.util.List<Territory> territoriesInContinent,
                                   java.util.List<Territory> playerTerritories)
        This method checks if the players owns all the territories of a continent or not.
        Parameters:
        territoriesInContinent: - List of territories present in a continent.
        playerTerritories: - List of territories player has currently.
        Returns:
        boolean: true if player owns all the territory of territoriesInContinent else false.

      • createPlayers

        public void createPlayers(java.util.List<Player> playerList,
                          int totalNumberOfPlayers)
        This method created player instances and adds them to playerList
        Parameters:
        playerList: - List of players who are playing the game.
        totalNumberOfPlayers: - total number of players to check how many armies should be assigned at the start of the game.

      • getNextPlayer

        public Player getNextPlayer(Player prevPlayer,
                            java.util.List<Player> playerList)
        This method gives the player who will have the next turn to play. Initially, turn is decided randomly and then based on the previous player next player is fetched form the palyerList.
        Parameters:
        prevPlayer: - player who has completed his turn
        playerList: - List of players in the game.
        Returns:
        Player: player who will be having next turn.

      • validateArmyInput

        public void validateArmyInput(java.lang.String inputText,
                              Player playerInFocus,
                              Territory territoryInFocus,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> errorList)
        This method validates if the input number of armies are valid or not.
        Parameters:
        inputText - : Text entered by the user.
        playerInFocus - : Player who has entered the input.
        territoryInFocus: - territory where the player is trying to add armies.
        errorList - : Error list containing errors related the text user input

      • getAttackableTerritories

        public java.util.List<Territory> getAttackableTerritories(Territory territory)
        This method will return a list of territories on which given territories can attack.
        Parameters:
        territory: - territory for which attackable territories needs to be found.
        Returns:
        List: a list of all the territories on which given territory can attack.

      • attack

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Integer> attack(Territory attackerTerritory,
                                                                    Territory defenderTerritory,
                                                                    boolean isAllOutMode,
                                                                    int totalAttackerDice,
                                                                    int totalDefenderDice,
                                                                    PhaseViewModel phaseViewModel)
        This method delegate attack from controller to player class.
        Parameters:
        attackerTerritory: - Territory from which attack is performed.
        defenderTerritory: - Territory to which attack is performed.
        isAllOutMode: - true if current attack is of All-Out mode else false.
        totalAttackerDice: - Number of dice to roll for attacker if current mode of attack is normal mode.
        totalDefenderDice: - Number of dice to roll for defender if current mode of attack is normal mode.
        phaseViewModel: - PhaseViewModel instance to update information on phase view with each step of attack.
        Returns:
        A Pair class which hold data as Boolean and Integer representing attack outcome and minimum troops to move.

      • fortify

        public void fortify(Territory from,
                    Territory to,
                    int armiesToMove,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> errorList)
        This method is used to do fortification in which armies are moved from one territory to another territory.
        Parameters:
        from: - Territory from which armies to be moved.
        to: - Territory to which armies to be moved.
        armiesToMove: - Number of armies to move.
        errorList: - List to hold validation errors.

      • getFortifiableTerritories

        public java.util.List<Territory> getFortifiableTerritories(Territory territory)
        This method will return a list of territories can be fortified by a given territory.
        Parameters:
        territory: - territory for which fortifiable territories needs to be found.
        Returns:
        List: a list of all the territories on which given territory can fortify.

      • randomIndex

        private int randomIndex(int min,
                        int max)
        This method is used to get a random number which will be between 0 and size of list of territories.
        Parameters:
        min - : lower range of the random number generated
        max - : upper range of the random number generated.
        Returns:
        : returns the random number generated between the range.

      • getArmyCount

        private int getArmyCount(int playerCount)
        This method is used to get the number of armies according to the number of players
        Parameters:
        playerCount: - Number of player playing the game
        Returns:
        int number of armies per player according to total number of players playing game.

      • addReinforcement

        public void addReinforcement(Territory selectedTerritory,
                             int numberOfArmies)
        This method current player's reinforcement method to add reinforcement armies to selected territory.
        Parameters:
        selectedTerritory: - Territory to which armies is to be added for reinforcement.
        numberOfArmies: - number of armies to add to a territory as reinforcement.

      • canPlayerAttackFurther

        public boolean canPlayerAttackFurther(Player currentPlayer)
        This method check if currentPlayer can attack any further or not.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer: - Player to which further attacking is possible or not is checked.
        Returns:
        true if this currentPlayer can attack further else false.

      • endOfStartUpPhase

        public boolean endOfStartUpPhase(java.util.Set<Player> playersWithZeroArmies,
                                 java.util.List<Player> playersList)
        This method defines the condition to verify if startUpPhase has ended or not.
        Returns:
        boolean: true if startUp phase is finished else false.

      • endOfReinforcementPhase

        public boolean endOfReinforcementPhase(Player playerInFocus,
                                       CardExchangeViewModel cardExchangeViewModel)
        This method defines the condition to verify if the Reinforcement phase has ended or not.
        Parameters:
        playerInFocus - : Player who is doing the reinforcement currently.
        Returns:
        boolean: true if reinforcement phase is finished for current player else false;

      • isGameEnded

        public boolean isGameEnded(Player player,
                           int totalTerritoriesInMap)
        This method checks if game is won by passed player or not as if player occupy all the territories then game is won by him.
        Parameters:
        player: - Player instance for which check is done.
        totalTerritoriesInMap: - Total number of territories.
        Returns:
        true if player own all the territories of map else false.

      • validateSelectedDiceNumber

        public void validateSelectedDiceNumber(Territory attackerTerritory,
                                       Territory defenderTerritory,
                                       java.lang.String attackerTotalDice,
                                       java.lang.String defenderTotalDice,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> errorList)
        This method is used to validate the number of dices user have entered for attacker and defender in normal mode.
        Parameters:
        attackerTerritory: - Attacking territory instance.
        defenderTerritory: - defender territory instance.
        attackerTotalDice: - Number of dice attacker will roll.
        defenderTotalDice: - Number of dice defender will roll.
        errorList: - List to hold validation errors.
